content.rendered:
> Series ProFace X It is a fully developed version of the profile product line, designed to handle all kinds of scenarios. Powered by the ZKTeco CPU dedicated to running the geometric face recognition algorithm and the latest computer vision technology, the profile X Series supports face and palm verification with large capacity and fast recognition speed, enhancing security performance in all aspects.

The series also helps to eliminate hygiene concerns ; not only because of the contactless recognition technology it is equipped with but also because of new functions such as fever detection and convincing individual identification.

The facial recognition capability of the series has reached a new level in the biometric technology industry with a maximum of 50,000 face templates, a face recognition speed of less than 0.3 seconds per face, and a maximum anti-plagiarism capability against almost all kinds of fake photos and videos attack.

In addition, 3-in-1 palm recognition is performed in 0.35 seconds for each hand; the obtained Palm data will be compared with a maximum of 5000 templates .

As mentioned above, the profile X series can help monitor infectious diseases as well. During outbreaks of infectious and Infectious Diseases, identification limbs with fever detection and a mask should be an ideal option. The series makes it possible to quickly and accurately measure body temperature and identify masked individuals during face and palm checks at all access points, which is very useful in combating the spread of disease outbreaks especially in hospitals, factories, schools, commercial buildings, stations and other public areas.

Data Sheet

excerpt.rendered:
• Anti-plagiarism algorithm against printing attack (laser, color, black and white images), video clips attack and three-dimensional mask attack
• Intelligent energy-saving design accurate distance assessment (up to 2.5 m (8.2 ft))
• 2MP Starlight CMOS sensor camera with WDR function
• 8-inch touch screen with a capacity of 400 Lux, which provides high visibility under strong and direct lighting
• Wide range of working temperature (16 degrees Celsius ~ 32 degrees Celsius, 60.8 degrees Fahrenheit ~ 89.6 degrees Fahrenheit)
• Body temperature detection: measurement deviation ± 0.3 degrees Celsius measuring distance 30-50cm
• Face verification mask detection is available with masks
